Package min3d.vos

Class Summary
AbstractDirtyManaged  
BooleanManaged  
CameraVo Encapsulates camera-related properties, including view frustrum.
Color4 Simple struct/VO.
Color4Managed Same functionality as Color4, but uses proper accessors to r,g,b, and a properties, rather than VO-style public variables, so that 'dirty flag' can be managed properly.
Face Simple VO with three properties representing vertex indicies.
FloatManaged  
FrustumManaged 'Managed' VO for the view frustrum.
Light Light must be added to Scene to take effect.
Number3d Simple VO holding x,y, and z values.
Number3dManaged 'Managed' version of Number3d VO
Ray Represents a geometric ray, compound of a Number3d.
ShadeModelManaged  
TexEnvxVo Structure to hold one OpenGL texture environment command.
TextureVo Contains the properties of a texture which can be assigned to an object.
Uv Simple VO used for texture positioning
Vertex3d Container holding VO's of vertex-related information.

FogType
